attributes.action: Get the Queen to knight Gareth Southgate on the pitch, if we win the euros
attributes.additional_details: Because he is a legend and brought it home
attributes.background: Get the Queen to knight Gareth Southgate on the pitch, if we win the euros

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
